description: Taylor Briggs is a 29 year old aspiring actor working hard each and every day to make his dreams become reality. He never thought he would be sitting down for an interview here at NDM but life has many paths and we are glad Taylor has visited us. He was in the Army for a few years and met lots of really nice people and traveled the world. Taylor has a gym he frequents that's right on the beach. He loves to work out and afterwards go relax and catch some sun on the beach. Once the interview was over Taylor began talking dirty and started to release himself while enjoying his moment here at NDM. We hope you like his thick hard cock and very manly hairy chest.
title: Taylor Briggs
